body.p: Well, what does it feel like to be rested up after the weekend? I haven’t been to bed early yet and it is 11:30 pm now. Guess what, I just looked outside + it is snowing heavily. It must be this rough country. You won’t have to read this letter twice because I haven’t done anything interesting since I left you.

Tuesday we had an enjoyable drive. I left home about 11:30. Oh the colt was born 7:30 Tuesday morning, a real little palomino. Anyways I got to Beaverton about 12:00. We had dinner in Huntsville + came through Algonquin park. We saw a doe + a fawn. And took a couple of pictures. The rest of the drive was just a drive. Hills and lakes. We got here about six. Tom was the only one here. That

we sat around and shot the breeze. Wednesday morning we drove to Barry’s Bay for a short hour job. The drive was 110 miles return. In the afternoon we did a couple other short jobs and laid around from 3 on.
Wednesday noon the big boss showed up followed by two others. They had a party last night not me.

Today we didn’t do any field work. The big boy’s all went fishing. This afternoon I tried plotting profile for the first time and after supper we had a poker game. I made $8.00. That brings things up to date. The big boy’s are all going home tomorrow so they won’t have a chance to it back, I hope.
I suppose a grade five compositions on Communism would be more interesting but nothing interesting has happened.

At least dear it will prove that I am thinking of you and that I miss you. I don’t know but when a letter around the weekend it helps the weekend go by. I hope you get this Saturday, because I left it rather late.
Well sweetheart, I hate to close but I have a headache + the rest of the fellows want to go to bed. So I will give you my address and close I will write again Sunday.
